column5: Looking for a good 1 day fly in for walleye and trophy northern. Up to six guys want to leave from the morson ont. area. Will be up there in june for a week and want to try a fly in.

You could fly into Arrow Lake. Great walleye, Smallmouth and pike fishing. Not sure about trophy Pike though. We also offer day trips to hike in lake. it is about a 45 minute hike and the fishing is awesome. Maybe 3 groups go in a year over the past 10 years.
thanks for the reply. what is the cost for 3 and for 6 people? You can pm if you like.
The cost is around $225.00 per person to fly in/out of Arrow. There is no additional charge to hike into the backwater Lake, if you stay with us.
Arrow lake is a good numbers lake, especially for walleye. I would not call it a trophy lake, but you will have lots of fun.
Hey thanks for the report there Devil Dog! I haven't found much info on arrow lake so far. But a numbers lake is always fun! SEMPER FI
